data.event: The Saach Pass at an altitude of 14,500 feet (4,400 m) is open for vehicular traffic between mid June and October, but closed by heavy snow at other times of the year.

event.title: covers 1,601 square kilometres (618 sq mi), and had a population of 17,598 at the 2001

data.event: The Pangi tehsil covers 1,601 square kilometres (618 sq mi), and had a population of 17,598 at the 2001 census.

event.title: 2013 debut Pangwali language development website was launched

data.event: In 2013 debut Pangwali language development website was launched in three languages Pangwali, Hindi and English.
